summary: Dimitri joins La Maison, a place where people are welcomed for whom medicine can not do anything anymore. There he meets Suzanne, a volunteer who is dedicated to supporting people at the end of their lives.
cast: Jacques Dutronc|Sandrine Bonnaire|Emmanuelle Riva|Jacques Spiesser|Annie Grégorio|Marilyne Canto|Patrick Lizana|Thierry Raso|Julia Vaidis-Bogard|Saïda Jawad|Nathan Pavillon-Barré|Julie Leibowitch|Martine Adinolfi|Dominique Baillot|Florian Bernaux|Anja Beving-Blanc|Guy Bocquel|Didier Bourguignon|Sylvia Brouillet|Olivier Capelier|Brigitte Cattedu|Marc Chamart|Frédéric César|Christophe De Lusignan|Bénédicte Defrasne|Sébastien Delorme|Rodolphe Depierre|Martin Dorino|Franck Galloud|Jean Garibo|Marie Camille Gaspari|Guy Gauffret|Jade Georgelin|Bernard Goniche|Jeanne Grasset|Olivier Gérard|Nadia Haddadi|Nathalie Hadj-Chikh|Guy Jaën|Janine Jaën|Lucien Jean-Baptiste|Nino Kirtadze|Marion Lehman|Magali Leiris|Lola Massue|Gustave Matabon|Marinette Matabon|Noé Metge|Joëlle Pavillon-Barré|Benoît Royer|Philippe Semori|Eugène Seroux|Serge Spoddig|Alaïs Vilbourg
title: La vida (C'est la vie)
